com.bigdata.rdf.rio

Class AbstractRIOTestCase

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IProxyTest, junit.framework.Test
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestAsynchronousStatementBufferFactory, TestLoadAndVerify

    public abstract class AbstractRIOTestCase
extends AbstractTripleStoreTestCase
    Abstract base class for unit tests involving the RIO integration.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

      • doLoad

        protected abstract void doLoad(AbstractTripleStore store,
          String resource,
          boolean parallel)
                        throws Exception
        Implementation must load the data. Generally, you create an IStatementBufferFactory and then invoke doLoad(AbstractTripleStore, String, boolean, IStatementBufferFactory)
        Parameters:
        store -
        resource -
        parallel - when true multiple source files will be loaded and verified in parallel.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • doLoad

        protected void doLoad(AbstractTripleStore store,
          String resource,
          boolean parallel,
          IStatementBufferFactory<BigdataStatement> factory)
               throws Exception
        Load the classpath resource or file / directory.

        Note: Normally we disable closure for this test, but that is not critical. If you compute the closure of the data set then there will simply be additional statements whose self-consistency among the statement indices will be verified, but it will not verify the correctness of the closure.

        Parameters:
        store - The KB into which the data will be loaded.
        resource - A classpath resource, a file, or a directory (processed recursively). Hidden files are NOT loaded in order to skip .svn and CVS directories.
        factory - The factory under test.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getLoadTasks

        protected List<Callable<Void>> getLoadTasks(String resource,
                                IStatementBufferFactory<BigdataStatement> factory)
        Returns a list containing either a single LoadTask for a classpath resource or a file or a set of LoadTask for the files in a directory.
        Parameters:

        factory -
        Returns:

      • doVerify

        protected void doVerify(AbstractTripleStore store,
            String resource,
            boolean parallel)
        Verify the KB contains all explicit statements read from the resource.
        Parameters:
        store - The KB.
        resource - A classpath resource, file, or directory (processed recursively).
        parallel - When true, multiple source files will be verified in parallel.
